nodes.text: Cold Danda Sine was one of the four spirits that inhabited the planet of Bedlam near the Bedlam Pulsar. During the Galactic Civil War, Danda met Princess Leia Organa who crashed on the planet and was escaping from three stormtroopers. The other spirit called Tilotny claimed she had created them, then decided to play with them and eventually killed them all. Danda became bored with the dead shapes, and departed.
As all other spirits, Cold Danda Sine was capable of manipulating time and mass. Danda often admired Horliss-Horliss, calling him incomparable and inventive.

Cold Danda Sine was created by Alan Moore for the comic Tilotny Throws a Shape, later collected in Classic Star Wars: Devilworlds 2. Unlike Tilotny and Splendid Ap, Danda's gender is never specified in the comic. In The Essential Atlas, the name is misspelled as "Cold Danda Sire."
